english_example_sentence: When they remained in the peaceful forest cabin, they read interesting novels
russian_example_sentence: Когда они остались в спокойной лесной хижине, они читали интересные романы
turkish_example_sentence: Onlar sakin orman kulübesinde kaldıklarında, ilginç romanlar okudular
